name: A Hero's Legacy - Game Jam TEAM NJ
name_original: A Hero's Legacy - Game Jam TEAM NJ
description:
A Hero's Legacy

Descendent of Heroes Past.

Inherit the will of your ancestors and embark on an adventure! Your actions and experiences are passed down to the New Generation.

Game-U's first Game Jam event.

We created two competitive teams, Team Andrew (NJ) vs. Team Clint (NY/OH), to develop their own games within 48 hours.

Here is TEAM NJ's submission.

TEAM NJ

Andrew Adomanis

Zack Hajbi

Justin Melendez

Ailsa Thiel

Nick Lewandowski

Andrew Byun
